name: ai-collab-agent
description: Opens a webview to kick off team setup and task allocation.

aiCollab.apiBaseUrl.description: Base URL of your Agent API (future use).

aiTasks.apiEndpoint.description: HTTP endpoint of the local AI backlog generator (POST /).

ai.openaiApiKey.markdownDescription: OpenAI API key used as a fallback when the local AI endpoint is unreachable.

ai.openaiProject.markdownDescription: OpenAI project (optional). If set, requests are scoped to this project.

ai.openaiModel.markdownDescription: OpenAI model to use for fallback (e.g., `gpt-5` if your project has access).

jira.baseUrl.description: Your Jira Cloud base URL (e.g., https://your-domain.atlassian.net).

jira.projectKey.description: Jira project key to create issues in (e.g., PROJ).

jira.email.description: Jira account email (paired with API token).

jira.apiToken.description: Jira API token. On first use this is copied into VS Code Secret Storage.
